Get Game Box Score

Source: R/kp_box_tables.R
kp_box.Rd

Get Game Box Score

kp_box(game_id, year)

Arguments

game_id

Game id of game to pull
year

Year of game to pull

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(kp_box(game_id = 1238, year = 2020))
